summary: An educational app for children to practice English conversation with an AI robot that provides corrections
architectural_notes: Speech recognition and text-to-speech required for voice interaction
Natural language processing needed for error detection
Child-safe content filtering and age-appropriate responses
imageRequirements:
## Required Images
- Friendly cartoon robot character with large expressive eyes and a welcoming smile, suitable for children's educational app (robot-character.dim_512x512.png)

existing_features.title: Create a child-friendly robot character interface that serves as the conversation partner, with visual elements appropriate for young English learners
Implement voice input functionality allowing children to speak English phrases or sentences to the robot
Display correction feedback from the robot in a clear, encouraging manner that explains mistakes without discouraging the child learner
Implement conversation flow where the robot responds to the child's input, providing both corrections and continuing the dialogue naturally
Apply a playful, educational design theme with bright colors, friendly typography, and an engaging layout that appeals to children while maintaining readability and usability

new_feature_requests.summary: Voice interaction system for children to speak with robot
English grammar and pronunciation correction feedback
Create backend logic to analyze spoken English input for grammar mistakes, pronunciation errors, and language inaccuracies
